short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Watch videos from video sharing websites with extra options.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an WebExtension addon based on my ViewTube userscript.

Supported sites:
YouTube, Dailymotion, Vimeo, Veoh, IMDb.

For more information read:
http://sebaro.pro/viewtube
https://gitlab.com/sebaro/viewtube
https://github.com/sebaro/viewtube
